content: the **block stitch chunky crochet hat** is a perfect project for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike made with warm and dense aran weight yarn this cozy hat works up quickly in *joined and turned rounds* using simple *double_crochet and single_crochet* stitches making it an easy yet satisfying make the block stitch a slight variation of the classic granny stitch adds beautiful texture and a timeless look while remaining effortless to master whether you re making one for yourself or as a thoughtful handmade gift this hat is perfect for everyone with *seven sizes included* in the pattern to fit all ages quick stylish and beginner-friendly it s a must-have for chilly days we ll begin by crocheting the brim in row then join it to work the body in the round with alternating colors carrying them up inside the hat for fewer ends to weave in finishing with decreases at the top add a pompom if desired and you re done crochet hook g+ 4 5mm & h 5 0mm -
